Name: Touch and Hypnosis ～ kunochi ninja Kunai ～
About the game: You track down and capture the traitorous Kunoichi ninja 'Kunai'. Then you hypnotize her by touching her with your mouse. This is a real time simulation game. ~Synopsis~ Kunoichi ninja Kunai and you were friends who grew up in the same ninja village 'Inga'. You liked kunai as the opposite sex, but kunai was different. She thought of you like her family. One day, during a mission, Kunai and you run into a handsome man named 'Makoto' from another ninja organization. At that moment, you witness the moment when Kunai falls in love with her at first sight and she falls in love with him. And Kunai, who is in love, finally escapes from 'Inga' and runs to Makoto. 'Inga', who does not forgive traitors, has sent you as a pursuer. Because you can use hypnosis to control a woman's body and mind... You chase her to stop Kunai and make her love your own. Game configuration ◆ Chasing part ◆ Chase and catch the fleeing kunai. If you catch up, it's a quick click battle. You triumph, knocking Kunai unconscious and taking her away. Use the mouse to touch the sleeping kunai so as not to wake it up. You will raise her Brainwashing Lv. As her Lv goes up, it will be harder for her to wake up, and you will be able to touch her more violently. Touch command ◆Finishing insertion part◆ Insert it to make the kunai's body remember your shape as the finishing touch of brainwashing. Click at the right time to make the kunai cum. ◆Ending◆ The ending branches depending on the brainwashing Lv and awakening state. You can enjoy the collected ending animations as you like in gallery mode. Gallery command
